titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Adrian Monthly Meeting records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: Reproduction Note
odd.p: Photocopy and microfilm of record book, 1831-1878; and microfilm of second record book.

archdesc.bioghist: Records of the monthly meeting of the Society of Friends, Adrian, Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Record book, 1831-1878, with minutes, record of births, marriage certificates, and statements of membership transfers; and record book containing death register, 1847-1881, and minutes of monthly meeting, 1837-1843.
